verbs.description: The fallout from his decision to [V: abandon] [ARG1: the Iran nuclear deal] [ARGM-TMP: last week] continues around the world , and on Wednesday the head of the European Council went after President Trump .

[ARG1: The fallout from his decision to abandon the Iran nuclear deal last week] [V: continues] [ARGM-LOC: around the world] , and on Wednesday the head of the European Council went after President Trump .
